overview: Young soldiers are roaming the forest aimlessly, shots are heard in the distance. But something isnâ€™t quite right. Soviet troops, the Wehrmacht and American soldiers in Iraq seem to be co-existing in the same peaceful woods. They speak awkwardly about war memories that could never have been their own. And yet they know them by heart. A lighthearted film connecting imagination and storytelling to the reality of war.
title: The Remembered Film
